website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and affordable design ideal for new golfers getting their bearings on golf bag organization. Versatile in black and white color arrangement.
pros: Has 5 generous pockets plus one velour-lined pocket to keep valuables
Dual carry strap is padded and well-designed to make carrying simple and comfortable
Has a reinforced handle toward the top that makes moving the bag easy
Overall great quality for budget-friendly price
cons: Only has a 5-way top for clubs, so it could be cumbersome and time-consuming reaching for clubs

customer_reviews.title: Great Callaway Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I have gotten a ton of compliments on it. The size is good not too big not too small and the backpack strap feature is really nice for when you have to walk with your bag. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Boydstun

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag - Not Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product by Callaway and it does what it's supposed to do. Two issues I have with it are first, I carry 14 clubs and with this bag at times it's difficult to pull a club with out pulling up two (or more) others. Also, it's difficult to replace clubs in the bag because it's crowded. Lastly, in windy conditions on a few occasions the bag has blown over. Is it a big deal, not really, but more of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mi

customer_reviews.title: Spoiled Surprise
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Very nice looking. Only bad thing was that Callaway is written on the box so my fiance knew what it was when it was delivered. I really wanted him to be surprised for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for compact and light!
customer_reviews.text: Compact in size, very light, and needs one more front pocket to be perfect. I have 2 drivers, 4-PW-AW and the bag looks pretty good. Update Oct 14, 2019 - Front pocket is starting to fray and come apart, called callaway and they are replacing. Great customer service, so-so product.
customer_reviews.author: brian tran

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves his golf bag
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is excited to use his new golf bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Deveraux-Rees

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, Great price
customer_reviews.text: This bag is lightweight and perfect for long golf trips. It is sturdy and overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: C_trureview

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. It is almost impossible to fit a full sets of clubs in this. I have to force the clubs in. I wish I had spent more for a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Not what I would expect from Callaway
customer_reviews.text: It is not a bad bab, just not quality you would expect from Callaway. Not sure why they would release such a low quality bag. Good for kids and beginner golfers... Would not want to be seen with it on a nice golf course.. Also had made in China all over the bag.. Hey Callaway make it in America would you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dougie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Garbage bag. Sat way too low upon purchase. Haven't had it standing more than an hour in it's life and the legs collapsed. Pure garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T Chack

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size bag!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for all my callaway clubs and then some. Plenty of space for balls, tees, glove, etc.... great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Very average bag
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing Callaway. My old bag from Aldi was much better. Average straps. Average quality. Lack of pockets & features even for a stand bag. Flimsy legs. Bad dividers.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Not enough room for clubs
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my brother in law and the space for all the clubs to fit in it was a concern- He may be returning it- was this a standard men's golf bag or something for juniors? Do you have other bags at a similar price with more compartments for clubs? I think this on had six but they were fairly small compartments.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. It's perfect for my son's golf leauge for school. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product....
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for several months and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great and was the perfect replacement for my older bag.
customer_reviews.author: sinica

customer_reviews.title: No surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my husband for Father's Day. I was delivered very quick........and I was out of town. I advised him to not open the box that was coming so it didn't spoil his surprise.........well...........he didn't have to open it. It was clearly marked on the outside of the box exactly what it was........down to the color! My oldest son thought it was funny to text me this photo!!! Oh well.....he loves it anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, feels great
customer_reviews.text: Hurray! Looks great, feels great, full size, plenty of storage. The legs flatten out though on a smooth surface and the bag falls to the floor kind of like a sprawled out dead cat.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Prater

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly great design and functionality for the price. Arrived with no issues and have had no issues for the past two months. Would recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bag and doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Was a great bag for the first month and now the legs won’t stay standing. Everyone you set the bag down on the legs they spread out until the bag is laying on the ground. Don’t waste your money on this ...buy the Ping Hofer bag
customer_reviews.author: Daren Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Golf Bag.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful golf bag. I’ve been golfing many years now and thought for this brand and bag and price this was a steal. So nice and very sturdy. Fits all my clubs and looks so fancy!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: he was happy with
customer_reviews.text: bought for my grandson just starting in golf; he was happy with product
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my 13 year old son. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great Women’s Golf Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying my new golf bag. It is lightweight and has plenty of compartments to accommodate everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Callaway golf bag. Clean design and compact. Good buy💰
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: It is a good golf bag for the money it cost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loves the look and its nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter on the High School team where they have to carry their bags during tournament. She loves the look and its nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Whittet

customer_reviews.title: Cheap good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect more and enough room and so light easy to carry. Same kind of way that I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Filipo A Agau

customer_reviews.title: Would make a great bag for a junior
customer_reviews.text: This is a light, little stand bag. Would make a great bag for a junior.
customer_reviews.author: KCinElDo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good bag. Has enough space for everything. The legs get a little stuck sometimes when putting the bag down.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dogg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this bag! For $100 you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Aric Wetmore

customer_reviews.title: Happy Golfer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good stand-bag. Well constructed. Great service.
customer_reviews.author: George J Murray

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my occasional golfer
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, no frills bag, perfect for my occasional golfer wife
customer_reviews.author: John VA

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and good looking. All clubs fit nicely and has plenty of pockets. Good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I didn't ordered this Color the right Color is Black/red/White
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Callaway Golf Capital Stand Bag
feature_bullets: Lightweight high mount automatic stand system for added stability
5 strategically placed pockets, including a velour-lined valuables pocket

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
